entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:34 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 12:55 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -30.3°C
Wind: SSE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late in the morning then sunny. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
